translation: Do not be afraid, nor be bewildered on seeing such a terrible form of Mine; with your fear dispelled and with a gladdened heart, now behold again this former form of Mine.
commentary: 11.49 at not? And thee? pain fear? Ma not? f and? bewildered state? seeing having seen? form form? Ghorm terrible? Eidruk such? My My?
